Question: In 1485, this person presented his plans to John II, King of Portugal.
Hints: This person called the island (in what is now The Bahamas) San Salvador; the natives called it Guanahani.
The World Columbian Exposition in Chicago, 1893, commemorated the 400th anniversary of the landing of this person in the Americas.
This person found the fort in ruins, destroyed by the native Taino people.
